text: Augustus Garrett (1801 - November 30, 1848) was an American politician who was the Mayor of Chicago, Illinois twice (1843–1844, 1845–1846) for the Democratic Party. Garrett was born in 1801 in New York City, New York. He was married to Elize Clark. They had no children. Garrett died on November 30, 1848 in Chicago, Illinois from a heart attack, aged 47. ==Other websites== *First Inaugural Address *Invalidated Second Inaugural Address *Third Inaugural Address Category:1801 births Category:1848 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Burials at Rosehill Cemetery Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:19th-century American politicians
title: Augustus Garrett
